DOC.brief_summary: THis study aim determine whether frequent dose intravitreal injection Ranibizumab ( Lucentis ) Bevacizumab ( Avastin ) , act VEGF inhibitor , deleterious effect retina , study electrophysiologic testing . This prospective , non-randomized clinical study include patient assigned intravitreal injection Ranibizumab Bevacizumab due neovascular AMD . The patient undergo repeat ophthalmic evaluation intravitreal injection every 4-6 week , long deem necessary . Periodic electrophysiologic evaluation include Electroretinogram ( ERG ) , electro-oculogram ( EOG ) Visual Evoked Potentials ( VEP ) test perform every 3 month .
DOC.brief_title: Study Long-Term Effect Frequent Anti-VEGF Dosing Retinal Function Patients With Neovascular AMD
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis CNV secondary AMD No ocular disease No history keratorefractive surgery No epilepsy Ability perform electrophysiologic study Pregnancy Minority Epilepsy History keratorefractive surgery
